title: Wind Farm Noise Impact Modeling
description: A permitting manager needs to model the noise propagation from a proposed wind farm to ensure it complies with local ordinances.

tasks.description: Gather the sound power level specifications for the selected wind turbine model.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent retrieves the manufacturer's noise data.

tasks.description: Identify the locations of the nearest residences and the local noise level limits (e.g., 45 dBA at night).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent maps nearby homes and retrieves the local noise ordinance.

tasks.description: Run a noise propagation model to predict the sound level at each residence.
tasks.expected_outcome: Model shows that all but one residence will be below the noise limit.

tasks.description: Suggest mitigation options, such as relocating a turbine or offering to purchase a noise easement from the affected homeowner.
